name: Movement Game Prototype
description:
Prototype v1.3 has been released (epic gamer moment)

"The Weapon Update"

-Camera now lags behind the player slightly to make movement more smooth and fluid

-Weapons now lag behind the camera

-Fixed a bug that causes the player to attempt to vault over ramps

-Weapons now render on top of everything else

-The pistol can now reload

-There are now reload and fire animations for the pistol

-All other guns (except rocket launcher and grenades) have been temporarily removed.

-Volume setting now persists through scene changes

-Volume now affects enemy death sounds and weapon sounds

-Gun now has sounds

-Screen now slightly shakes when firing the gun

-Holding right click zooms in with the gun

-Aiming while airborne slows down time

Known Bugs:

-Gun sounds get abruptly cut off when switching weapons mid-sound

-Pressing reload multiple times in quick succession causes the sound to be played twice
